title: Completed PE Summary - St Rognvald
raw_html:
Category Merchant
Date 18/10/03
Incident Type: Equipment failure
Injuries/ fatalities: None

Synopsis

Failure of lifeboat davit.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents made recommendations to owners of the vessel with reference to:

  • Awareness of responsibilities

  • Instructions on the use of lifesaving equipment

  • Crew to be practised and competent in launching and recovery of lifeboats

  • Rotation of tasks in drills among crew
body:
Category |   | Merchant | 
Date  |   | 18/10/03 | 
Incident Type: |   | Equipment failure | 
Injuries/ fatalities: |   | None | 

Synopsis

Failure of lifeboat davit.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents made recommendations to owners of the vessel with reference to: 

  * Awareness of responsibilities 

  * Instructions on the use of lifesaving equipment 

  * Crew to be practised and competent in launching and recovery of lifeboats 

  * Rotation of tasks in drills among crew 

* * *
